statements: SELECT id, assistant_name, language_preference FROM Virtual_Assistants;
SELECT * FROM Virtual_Assistants WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT assistant_name, theme_preference FROM Virtual_Assistants ORDER BY assistant_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, assistant_name, language_preference FROM Virtual_Assistants WHERE language_preference = 'English';
SELECT * FROM Virtual_Assistants WHERE theme_preference = 'Dark' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT assistant_name, language_preference FROM Virtual_Assistants WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Virtual_Assistants WHERE theme_preference = 'Dark' ORDER BY assistant_name ASC;
SELECT assistant_name, theme_preference FROM Virtual_Assistants WHERE user_id > 5 ORDER BY assistant_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, assistant_name, language_preference, theme_preference FROM Virtual_Assistants WHERE language_preference IN ('English', 'Spanish');
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_assistants FROM Virtual_Assistants WHERE theme_preference IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM virtual_assistant_users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM virtual_assistant_users WHERE active = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, email, timezone FROM virtual_assistant_users WHERE timezone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM virtual_assistant_preferences WHERE preference_name = 'theme';
SELECT user_id, preference_name, preference_value FROM virtual_assistant_preferences ORDER BY preference_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_assistant_users WHERE active = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM virtual_assistant_users WHERE timezone = 'GMT';
SELECT user_id, email, preference_name, preference_value FROM virtual_assistant_users JOIN virtual_assistant_preferences ON virtual_assistant_users.user_id = virtual_assistant_preferences.user_id;
SELECT user_id, username, email, active from virtual_assistant_users WHERE active = FALSE ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_assistant_preferences WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM virtual_assistant_users WHERE timezone = 'PST');
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_id, assistant_name FROM UserPreferences WHERE language = 'English'
SELECT * FROM UserSettings ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT assistant_id, timezone FROM UserSettings WHERE notifications_enabled = TRUE
SELECT task_description, task_status FROM AssistantTasks
SELECT user_id, assistant_name, language, theme FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM UserSettings WHERE notifications_enabled = true AND timezone = 'GMT';
SELECT user_id, task_description, task_status FROM AssistantTasks ORDER BY task_status DESC;
SELECT assistant_name, COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM UserPreferences GROUP BY assistant_name HAVING total_users >= 2;
SELECT assistant_name, language, theme FROM UserPreferences JOIN UserSettings ON UserPreferences.user_id = UserSettings.user_id WHERE assistant_name LIKE '%Assist%' AND notifications_enabled = true;
SELECT * FROM virtual_assistants;
SELECT user_id, assistant_name, language_preference FROM virtual_assistants WHERE language_preference = 'English';
SELECT user_id, assistant_name FROM virtual_assistants ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE font_size > 12;
SELECT user_id, assistant_name, timezone FROM virtual_assistants WHERE timezone = 'GMT+3';
SELECT * FROM virtual_assistants ORDER BY assistant_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, language_preference FROM virtual_assistants WHERE timezone = 'UTC';
SELECT assistant_name, language_preference, timezone FROM virtual_assistants WHERE language_preference = 'English' AND timezone = 'EST';
SELECT user_id, theme_name, theme_color FROM user_preferences JOIN themes ON user_preferences.theme = themes.theme_name;
SELECT language_name, language_code FROM languages WHERE language_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, notification_enabled, notification_sound FROM settings WHERE notification_enabled = true;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT username, email, created_at FROM users WHERE user_id = 2
SELECT theme, language FROM preferences WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT reminder_text, reminder_date FROM reminders WHERE user_id = 3
SELECT task_name, task_description, status FROM tasks WHERE user_id = 2
